message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I think you'll find very valuable. My asking price is $130. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. $120 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $125. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your flexibility, but $125 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $115. Is that something you'd consider?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $115 just isn't going to work for me.  Let's split the difference at $120. That's a fair price considering the value you'll get out of this product.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I really think $115 is the best price we can agree on. I'm willing to make a deal at this price. Please let me know if you're willing to accept it.
